snippet: Weaker investments and exports pushed the 2014 number downward to 5.02 percent, slower than growth of 5.58 percent in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Weaker investments and exports pushed the 2014 number downward to 5.02 percent, slower than growth of 5.58 percent in 2013.

headline.main: Indonesian Economic Growth Falls to Its Lowest in 5 Years
headline.print_headline: Indonesian Economic Growth Falls to Its Lowest in 5 Years
